mapper.select: SELECT ID,FUNCTION_ID,ACCOUNT_ID FROM M_SYS_ROLE WHERE ACCOUNT_ID=#{accountId}

select DISTINCT f.ID,f.LEVEL,f.PARENT_ID,f.TITLE,f.URL from M_SYS_FUNCTION f INNER JOIN M_SYS_ROLE r on f.ID=r.FUNCTION_ID inner join M_SYS_ACCOUNT a ON a.ID=r.ACCOUNT_ID WHERE a.ID=#{accountId} order by f.`DESC`
